property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The altar does nothing; the device is crushed under the weight of its own impurity." - Ushanti, leonin seer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unfortunately, it doesn't restrain the beast's smell." - Glissa Sunseeker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Auriok Bladewarden's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok have learned through constant struggle that allies are more precious than water.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equip costs you pay cost {1} less. As long as Auriok Steelshaper is equipped, each creature you control that's a Soldier or a Knight gets +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They put their safety in his hands. He puts sharpened steel in theirs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My grandfather knew enough spells to fill a hundred scrolls. Nowadays, if a spell cannot fight the levelers, it is not even taught to our young."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time target creature would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stunned by the mere presence of the leonin kha, the nim raider quickly fell to its knees.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Tap two target creatures. • Creatures don't untap during target player's next untap step. Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only leonin clerics who can survive the Razor Fields for one turning of the suns can stand in the Cave of Light.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Leonin Den-Guard is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one under the four suns can elude the watchful eye of the den-guard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wisdom of the elders is just as much a weapon as a sword or spear. We must learn to wield it." - Ushanti, leonin seer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The skyhunters were born when the first leonin gazed at the heavens and wished to hunt the birds overhead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok believe that in the hands of a loxodon, no weapon can be broken.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, the player with the lowest life total gains control of Loxodon Peacekeeper. If two or more players are tied for lowest life total, you choose one of them, and that player gains control of Loxodon Peacekeeper.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Loxodon Punisher gets +2/+2 for each Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The loxodons believe punishment comes in two steps: pain and atonement. They carry a weapon for each.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The nim raid our homes without warning. We must defend our homes without hesitation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target permanent you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We protect our homelands. Why should they not protect us?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. • Untap all creatures you control. Entwine {1}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Appointed by the kha himself, members of the tribunal ensure all disputes are settled with the utmost fairness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player returns to the battlefield all artifact, creature, enchantment, and land cards in their graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bright tunnel sometimes leads back to life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Skyhunter Cub is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every young leonin wishes to become a skyhunter, for they soar closest to the suns.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, first strike (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach, and it deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are the first to raise the alarm when the levelers attack, and the first to risk their lives to defend the pride." - Raksha Golden Cub, leonin kha

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Slith Ascendant deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instinctively drawn to the light of its "mother-sun," each slith follows that sun's path around Mirrodin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy all creatures with power 2 or less. • Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. Entwine - Sacrifice two lands. (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target attacking creature and all Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Within seconds, the nim was consumed in blinding sunfire. Afterwards, only a puddle of molten iron remained.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an artifact would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with mana value X or less, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This world reeks of another's hand. Someone or something is defying the power of the gods and shaping this planet. I intend for it to stop." - Glissa Sunseeker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Murder of the living is tragic, but murder of the idea is unforgivable." - Janus, speaker of the synod

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying Broodstar's power and toughness are each equal to the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Unattach all Equipment from target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be thankful I left you your clothes."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact creature You control enchanted artifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Since they haven't seen their original master for millennia, golems are eager to take orders from anyone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Tap target permanent. • Untap target permanent. Entwine {1} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secret to invention is to see something in your mind, then find where it hides in the world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player chooses draw step, main phase, or combat phase. The player skips each instance of the chosen step or phase this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No one knows what she is watching, but she never takes her eyes off it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I wouldn't want you to hurt yourself." - Bruenna, Neurok leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Looming Hoverguard enters the battlefield, put target artifact on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Although mute, hoverguards get their message across loud and clear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card. If that player discards an artifact card this way, untap Lumengrid Augur.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Information pumps like blood through vedalken society.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may tap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken order their Neurok sentinels to watch over the shores of the Quicksilver Sea, as if they know of intruders yet to come.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok, like the vedalken, are on a constant quest for knowledge. It is their currency, their trade, their life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each noncreature artifact is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its mana value. (Equipment that's a creature can't equip a creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Neurok Familiar enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an artifact card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Neurok Spy can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From the murk of Mephidross to the heart of Kuldotha, the vedalken send their servants forth to gather knowledge from every inch of Mirrodin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Knowledge Pool has all the answers - especially ‘No.'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Psychic Membrane blocks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken always put their best thought forward.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Quicksilver Elemental gains all activated abilities of target creature until end of turn. (If any of the abilities use that creature's name, use this creature's name instead.) You may spend blue mana as though it were mana of any color to pay the activation costs of Quicksilver Elemental's abilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once cast, a spell can be undone. But once revealed, a secret can never again be kept." - Pontifex, elder researcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: If a player would draw a card, that player exiles the top card of one of their opponents' libraries face down instead. Each player may look at cards they exiled with Shared Fate, and they may play lands and cast spells from among those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Slith Strider becomes blocked, draw a card. Whenever Slith Strider deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A slith's form and function are determined by the color of the sun under which it's born.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken interrogate all intruders - once the hoverguards are done with them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. • Each player draws seven cards. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken eyes don't see the beauty in things. They see only what those things can teach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Knowledge Pool knows. Memnarch understands." - Janus, speaker of the synod

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wanderguard Sentry enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Created by the vedalken to guard Lumengrid, the drones' empty eyes look beyond the Quicksilver Sea.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the game of conquest, who cares about the pawns if the king yet reigns?" - Geth, keeper of the Vault

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Destroy target creature. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Entwine - Sacrifice three lands. (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Chimney Imp dies, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mephidross changes all who dwell there, taking their lives and adding them to its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, its controller loses 3 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may have target opponent lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He stands in the shadow of his lord, Geth, drinking in the dark energies of the Vault.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white At the beginning of your end step, you lose 4 life. Whenever a creature dies, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would never have believed that on a world with four suns there could exist a place so dark." - Glissa Sunseeker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Flayed Nim deals combat damage to a creature, that creature's controller loses that much life. {2}{B}: Regenerate Flayed Nim.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a nonland card and reveal it. Each opponent who cast a spell this turn with the same name as that card loses 6 life. Then shuffle. {B}{B}: Return Grim Reminder from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The blast ignores the cage of metal but devours the flesh inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Moriok Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many go to Mephidross in search of lost riches. Most end up as part of the cache.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mephidross filled with roars of fury and wails of despair as the leonin fought to keep their memories from being pulled into the mists.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nim Devourer gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control. {B}{B}: Return Nim Devourer from your graveyard to the battlefield, then sacrifice a creature. Activate only during your upkeep.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nim Lasher gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rotting metal feeds the necrogen mists, and in turn the mists feed the nim.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nim Shambler gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Nim Shambler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Called "the Dross" by its inhabitants, Mephidross is home to the nim, Mirrodin's mindless, ravenous undead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Nim Shrieker gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As imps they were an annoyance. As nim they are a pestilence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • You draw five cards and you lose 5 life. • Create an X/X black Demon creature token with flying, where X is the number of cards in your hand. Entwine {4} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Reiver Demon enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all nonartifact, nonblack creatures. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A sword that has seen cowardice in battle exacts the price of honor from its wielder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Slith Bloodletter deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{B}: Regenerate Slith Bloodletter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins fear the slith, believing they are children banished from the womb of the Steel Mother, deep within Kuldotha.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a card name. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with that name, then put that card into your hand. Exile all other cards revealed this way, and you lose 1 life for each of the exiled cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A simple trap in a dark corner of the mind, and their nightmares catch up with them." - Geth, keeper of the Vault

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield, Vermiculos gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin's artificial environment requires its own predators, scavengers, and senseless forces of nature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Regenerate each creature you control. • Wail of the Nim deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Entwine {B} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Pay 1 life: Wall of Blood gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Woebearer deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards two cards unless they discard an artifact card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What is the sound of one head snapping?

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Exile the top ten cards of your library: Arc-Slogger deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shuffling sound and the smell of ozone follow the slogger as surely as its electric tail.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Atog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Dominaria, a scavenger. On Mirrodin, a predator.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact, creature, or enchantment enters the battlefield, its controller chooses target permanent another player controls that shares a card type with it. Exchange control of those permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact with mana value X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins have forty-two different words for "ow."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Electrostatic Bolt deals 2 damage to target creature. If it's an artifact creature, Electrostatic Bolt deals 4 damage to it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to avoid electric shock when the entire plane is metallic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip a coin until you lose a flip or choose to stop flipping. If you lose a flip, Fiery Gambit has no effect. If you win one or more flips, Fiery Gambit deals 3 damage to target creature. If you win two or more flips, Fiery Gambit deals 6 damage to each opponent. If you win three or more flips, draw nine cards and untap all lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gron's mind reeled with possibilities, most of which are best left unmentioned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the sacrificed artifact's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, that spell or ability's controller gains control of that creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's no word in the goblin language for "strategy." Then again, there's no word in the goblin language for "word."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Until end of turn, you gain control of target creature and it gains haste. • Sacrifice a creature. Grab the Reins deals damage equal to that creature's power to any target. Entwine {2}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Creatures target player controls attack this turn if able. • Creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Krark-Clan Grunt gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more weapons a goblin breaks in battle, the more respected he becomes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Krark-Clan Shaman deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you mean, we're out of stuff to melt down? Give me your leg."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sooner you see the whites of their eyes, the sooner you'll spill the red of their blood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Megatog gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In an ironic bit of evolution, the megatog's dozens of teeth are mainly ornamental. It prefers swallowing things whole.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the molten rains fall, entire landscapes melt and flow away in rivulets of fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ogre Leadfoot becomes blocked by an artifact creature, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the goblins need more scrap for the Great Furnace, they simply let the ogres loose and follow in their wake.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Rustmouth Ogre deals combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has an iron stomach. Literally.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vulshok mana rituals echo the day when the red sun burst through Mirrodin's surface to take its place in the heavens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Days of planning. Weeks of building. Months of perfecting. Seconds of smashing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}: Spikeshot Goblin deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path of a goblin shaman is a journey through a thousand ways of hurting people.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins generally have two possessions: one per hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Vulshok Battlemaster enters the battlefield, attach all Equipment on the battlefield to it. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I could demonstrate how the leonin sunsplicer works, but then you'd be too dead to buy one."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He experiences every emotion with passion and repays every slight with vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When War Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless an opponent was dealt damage this turn. Whenever an opponent is dealt damage, put that many +1/+1 counters on War Elemental.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would gladly die for the forest, but I'm much better at killing for it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To study the predators of the Tangle, two people are required: one to watch from above, and one to run like hell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{G}, {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In a strange twist of fate, one of the most annoying creatures in the multiverse was brought to the place where it could cause the most damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Copperhoof Vorrac gets +1/+1 for each untapped permanent your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like all forest beasts, it lives by one rule: if there's no room to grow, make some.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The deadliest force on Mirrodin isn't the largest organism - it's the smallest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing in this world, not even magic, likes to be caged."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Big ones hunt the elves, so the elves hunt the small ones to keep them from getting big.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike {T}: Destroy target artifact if its mana value is equal to the amount of unspent mana you have.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's a secret at the heart of this world, and I will unlock it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Groffskithur becomes blocked, you may return target card named Groffskithur from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It growls not to threaten, but to summon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each artifact spell costs {1} more to cast for each artifact its controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves learned long ago that anything left here slowly vanishes. Now it is a sacred site where the dead are laid to rest and where unnatural magic is erased forever.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. • You may play up to two additional lands this turn. Entwine {2}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Living Hive deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In its center is a single red ant, a queen that regulates the hive's movements.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fortunately for it, Mirrodin is a plane without salt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Create a 5/5 green Beast creature token. • Create five 1/1 green Insect creature tokens. Entwine {G}{G}{G} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath the Tangle, the wurm tunnels stretch . . . wide as a stone's throw, long as forever, deep as you dare.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you hear it coming, you're not its prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Slith Predator deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born amid the molten metal of the Great Furnace, the slith have more than adapted to the perils of a metal world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One glimpse of an elf's home lasts her weeks away in the wild.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from artifacts; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are extensions of the Tangle, stretching its vines into the furthest reaches of the sky.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is my honor to keep safe Tel-Jilad's secrets, not to know them."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For his crimes, he was made to forget all the trolls' secrets. Now he knows only that he is outcast, but not why.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Search your library for up to two creature cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. • Put up to two creature cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {1}{G}: Regenerate Troll Ascetic.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's no coincidence that the oldest trolls are also the angriest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secret of this world weighs upon us, and we have been shaped by time and duty to bear it."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin's inhabitants must be prepared for anything - including suddenly being unprepared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add an amount of {G} equal to Viridian Joiner's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Tangle reaches out to itself constantly, forming new connections. We must follow its example."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Viridian Shaman enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Because the elves are so in touch with Mirrodin's nature, they understand best how to dismantle it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wurmskin Forger enters the battlefield, distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes three weeks for a patrol of hunters to down a slagwurm. It takes just as long to make a single cut in its hide.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Return target creature to its owner's hand. {1}, Sacrifice Aether Spellbomb: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Release that which was never caged." - Spellbomb inscription

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First to charge, first to fight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on Altar of Shadows. {7}, {T}: Destroy target creature. Then put a charge counter on Altar of Shadows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each charge counter on Banshee's Blade. Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put a charge counter on Banshee's Blade. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

property.value: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, if Blinkmoth Urn is untapped, that player adds {C} for each artifact they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken embed such urns in their living artifact creations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample {3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's mana value to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets buried deep in his memory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cathodions repair the Great Furnace by soldering parts of themselves to the mechanism. Eventually, they become one with the machine.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Sphere: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As expected, this sphere's design reflects the colors of the four moons . . . plus another?" - Pontifex, elder researcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Clockwork Beetle enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Beetle attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Clockwork Condor enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Condor attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Clockwork Dragon enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Dragon attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat. {3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Dragon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Clockwork Vorrac enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever Clockwork Vorrac attacks or blocks, remove a +1/+1 counter from it at end of combat. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Clockwork Vorrac.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{U}: Cobalt Golem gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries before the first tides of the Quicksilver Sea rose to meet each new sun, Mirrodin's light shone on the golems alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves thought of the myr as minor threats, just as the myr thought of the elves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T} or {U}, {T}: Return target creature to its owner's hand unless its controller pays {1}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vedalken know it is not of this world, so they know that this world is not the only one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy target nonland permanent with the lowest mana value. (If two or more permanents are tied for lowest, target any one of them.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Activated abilities of artifacts and creatures can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The priests tried cursing it. The mages tried dispelling it. In the end, they all obeyed it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy both creatures. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

property.value: {3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single drop turns skin to scale and fist to claw.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Dross Scorpion or another artifact creature dies, you may untap target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They skitter out of the mists to consume fresh kill before Mephidross has a chance to corrode it away.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Duskworker becomes blocked, regenerate it. {3}: Duskworker gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the setting of each sun, it emerges to clean Mirrodin's floor of the day's carrion.

property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand. Equip {2}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a source an opponent controls deals damage to you, if Farsight Mask is untapped, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It turns the adversity of the moment into the knowledge of a lifetime.

property.value: Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At first, vedalken observers thought blinkmoths naturally avoided certain places. Then they realized those places were frogmite feeding grounds.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A solution in search of a problem.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add three mana of any one color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Over such beauty, wars are fought. With such power, wars are won.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Goblin Charbelcher deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to any target. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, Goblin Charbelcher deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.value: The leonin thought of the myr as omens, never imagining the sinister fate they foretold.

property.value: It's a piece of a world the goblins have never seen but would dearly like to blow up.

property.value: The vedalken protect the Knowledge Pool at any cost.

property.value: {3}, {T} or {G}, {T}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like all other relics, it was left on the Radix by the elves to be destroyed. Unlike all other relics, it persisted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}: Hematite Golem gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries before the first peaks of the Oxidda Chain rewrote the laws of magnetism, the golems patrolled Mirrodin's featureless surface unhindered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A model of Mirrodin in both shape and spirit.

property.value: The goblins didn't think of the myr at all, which allowed the myr to observe everywhere unhindered.

property.value: At the beginning of your end step, target opponent gains control of Jinxed Choker and puts a charge counter on it. property.value: If you would flip a coin, instead flip two coins and ignore one.

property.value: Once a century, the levelers rip through every corner of Mirrodin, obeying the commands of an unseen master.

Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Etched on Tel-Jilad's trunk is an entire history of Mirrodin - except for an expanse near the ground scrubbed smooth by an unknown hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Thought Prison enters the battlefield, you may have target player reveal their hand. If you do, choose a nonland card from it and exile that card. Whenever a player casts a spell that shares a color or mana value with the exiled card, Thought Prison deals 2 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, each player exiles the top card of their library. The player who exiled the card with the highest mana value takes an extra turn after this one. If two or more players' cards are tied for highest, the tied players repeat this process until the tie is broken.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ur-golem runes tell of the transformation of Mirrodin's warden from silent guardian to merciless god.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its etchings tell the ur-golems' stories of an entity able to force life into a lifeless plane.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ur-golem etchings begin by celebrating Mirrodin's creator, a golem of almost limitless power. They end by cursing its protector, a being called Memnarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Etched on its surface are warnings from a long-lost race of ur-golems pushed to the brink of extinction.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triskelion enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Triskelion: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target." Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has trample and can't be blocked by more than one creature. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +4/+2 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Welding Jar: Regenerate target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wires crawl over broken metal and heat themselves to melting, filling cracks quickly and efficiently.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {U}, Sacrifice Wizard Replica: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy all permanents other than Worldslayer. Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Poets dream the verses of otherworldly stories. Artificers dream the blueprints of otherplanar artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Taj-Nar, throne of Raksha Golden Cub, destined leader of the leonin prides.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When dictated by blinkmoth migratory patterns, clouds of tiny lights well up from Mirrodin's core.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cloudpost enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} for each Locus on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He watches from above. He watches from below. He watches from within." - Inscription on Tel-Jilad, the Tree of Tales

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of the end step, if you control no artifacts, sacrifice Glimmervoid. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An empty canvas holds infinite possibilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kuldotha, wellspring of molten metal, temple of the goblin horde.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lumengrid, site of the Knowledge Pool, source of vedalken arcana.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {6}: Stalking Stones becomes a 3/3 Elemental artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tel-Jilad, sanctum of the ancient trolls, keepers of the secret of Mirrodin's origin.
